cameraOrientation.infoTxt:
This camera can be used either with intelligent video applications or in multiple view modes. Select the one that best serves your purpose.

If multiple view modes is selected, make sure to select the correct camera orientation before saving since the camera works differently depending on how it is mounted.
cameraOrientation.info2Txt: This camera works differently depending on if it is wall mounted or ceiling/desktop mounted. Make sure to select the correct camera orientation before saving.
